description: This program is good and should be updated to GTK4 and put on the apps.gnome.org website imo
The hands-free instructions and timers are really slick. It's fast and easy to add your own recipes. Overall, it looks really good. I've been enjoying using it.
I'm hopping this project keeps getting better to the point you can compare it to what Pinterest or other social networks do. The app it self is great.
This app is a great example of GTK3.

Works great and I would love to see the database here expand. However at the moment there are not very many recipes (although the ones that do exist are high quality)

The UI is great and is on par for other GNOME apps.

I really want to like this app because it's pretty slick and Gnome-native, but it has a couple of show stoppers. First, any recipe I add to it shows up as "by Anonymous" instead of under my own name. Secondly, under "My Recipes" I don't see my recipes, but recipes from Bruce Bannock. My name is Bruce, but not Bruce Bannock.
summary: I want to like this app

description: Downloaded this after upgrading to Ubuntu 19.10, and finding that Gourmet Recipe manger no longer works and KRecipes will not load any longer. Software looked interesting until I actually tried to use it. First issue - importing does not work. I tried every export from Gourmet and none of them would open under Gnome Recipes. Same with my KRcipes data file. Second issue - when adding ingredients it changes to quantity something I do not want, such as 1/2 cup to 8 tablespoons. Third issue - I tried to add a pie recipe and there was no "none" option under spiciness. Even mild is not appropriate. Since I have a dual booting system, I will search the Windows world for a recipe manager.

It saves recipes like it should but it is too picky how yo add ingredients like you can't use Lb you have to use Pound. Way too picky. Guess I'll just go back to notecase pro or use zim or something so I can do it the way I want to.

I am writing this at the time that my country is in lockdown with the virus that is sweeping the world...

As there is nothing else to do in my flat, I thought I would give baking a go - this app comes into its own by holding so many recipes - always something to choose from, so there is no chance of boredom - obesity, yes - but boredom, no!

I can't import recipes from Gourmet (which is no longer supported).
Also, a lot of other persons recipes are visible - I just want to see mine.

It forces the metric entry to imperial.
I couldn't see a way to configure it to prefer the metric system.
(It looks very nice though :-)

After reading a few reviews, i have to agree with them, my first show stopper was the ingredient list, it converts american measurements like cups to ML's and such.  There are not any options to customize the app, so clearly a half done app. also not being able to import recipes or add new dropdown options to the categories, but keep working on it, and finish it. it is a good idea.
An absolute horrible replacement for Gourmet. This app has no import function so any additions must be typed in manually.
summary: If you like to type then this is a great app

description: Half the recipes in this app don't even tell you proportions!!
The measure section changes measurements when adding new recipes. 1 1/2 cups gets changed to 1 cup 1/10 teaspoon.
The recipes that require a specific fractional measurement is not common in cooking. They should be rounded to next whole number. It might have a possible chance.
Easy to use, and easy to find recipes, that are presented in a easy to follow format. Instructions, and ingredients required, etc, are in a clear and consise manner
summary: Highly recommended for anyone into trying new things

description:
I see quite many recipes that miss ingredients in the list, and are even wrongly categorized (search for vegan for a good laugh).
Instead of manual curation, I would like to see collections of *favourites* by user, and the ability to fork recipes and make variations. In general some more user-networking functionality would help to get a more interesting personalized view.
summary: Interesting concept, but needs some moderation/curation

description:
No settings to force the programs to use EU SI units - out of the box the app converts all units to US units - not usable in EU., sorry!
GUI is nice, though
summary: Nice GUI, but bad unit conversion

description:
The app has a nice interface all be it a little confusing. No straight forward top menu. However it lacks features that would be very useful. Like an import tool for Gourmet Recipe database. Also web page import. 

This app would suit the occasional user with a few recipes, but at over 800 recipes I am not entering them one at a time. Keep up the developement will try later
summary: Nice, But not a replacement for Gourmet Recipe Manager

description: I hope more recipes will be added!

Really wanted to use this. Since Gourmet Recipe did not want to work out of the box on Ubuntu 20.04. This was the only alternative. However without an import feature any but a few recipes, would be a bear to switch to this.
summary: Not for an established recipe collection

description: But it crashes. A lot. It consistently crashes when I export my recipe library as a back-up, too. I've only added 3 recipes. I had to do this by hand, there's no import method. I'm nervous about adding more as I don't want my library of recipes to become corrupt.
summary: I want to enjoy this app

description: wennige sterne kann ich nicht gebeneeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
summary: wie öffne ich das programm Toll Linux

description: Funktioniert wohl bei mir, aber abgesehen dass die Sprachen irgendwie gemischt sind (denglisch (english und deutsch)) scheint es keinen Filter für die nicht Fleischfresser zu geben ;-)
warum rechnet das program esslöffel und teelöffel in ml um?
Es maravillosa, hoy me ha hecho un parote para una comida que tenía que preparar!!
Todo es genial pero tiene muy poca variedad en cuanto a recetas mediterráneas. Añadiría la opción de búsqueda de recetas por ingredientes (así en plural xD)

es realmente excelente, de verdad me encanta, porque se que me servirá de gran utilidad.

Además, ¡es accesible con el lector de pantalla orca!
summary: Excelente, se que me servirá de gran utilidad

description:
muy pocas recetas . le pondria videos de youtube con recetas con video

y tambien cosinas sudamericanas
Buena aplicación. De momento no hay muchas recetas pero creo que es una idea muy prometedora.
Aplicación sencilla pero con capacidad de guardar ordenadamente las recetas. Incluye algunas y se pueden agregar mucho más.
App très intéressante mais toujours pas de traduction malgrés les années.
Une application très intéressante. Il y a seulement, malheureusement, un manque conséquent de recettes et la traduction n'est toujours pas au point... Application à suivre...
dommage il y a peu être de l'idée je pense que l'on peu mettre ses recettes personnel , mais sans la traduction pas évident.

Impossible to change langage, impossible to edit a shopping list, impossible to add some characteristics.
At the end, a useless app.

Application trop rigide, notamment dans l'introduction des ingrédients. Non traduite en français. Recettes proposées peu nombreuses et pas très réalistes. Application instable soius Fedora 32. Ne sauvegarde pas les recettes. Franchement autant prendre un crayon et un cahier, ça va plus vite et c'est plus efficace !
